name: LISA (itch) (zePocketDroid, SavestateCorrupted)
description:
Lisa is a bullet-hell visual novel game full of consequences.

You play as Lisa, a high school graduate trying to get into a popular university. Life isn't normal for her because her hair changes color with her own stress level, along with the mystery of her past and her own destructive thoughts.

Guide Lisa through her actions, her choices, and her passions to escape her own prison - her own mind. Avoid every single negative thoughts that crosses her mind as they can misguide you to choose worse choices. Unravel the mystery and take the choice you want - Her choices is in your hands!

Key Features
  • Colorful and Interesting Story and Visuals
    Every moment is meant to be enjoyed in this unique, live 2D style story
  • Multiple Endings (Full version only)
    3 Endings, no more and no less. Uncover them all
  • Moderate Bullet-Hell Experience
    Try again as much as you wanted. You can give up to her destructive thoughts or keep going.
  • Story, with a little spin
    Texts is boring, game is fun. Why not both?

Credits :

Story is adapted from my own real-life experience, with the influence of Life is Strange's soft magic stories and You Left Me's artstyle
